title: Sahaba's
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Thai, Delivery, Take-out, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Indo-Asian cuisine with fusion of traditional recipes, laced with influences from India, Bangladesh, and Thailand along with charcoal grill dishes. Starters include veg samosas, pakoras, aloo chat & dhal soup. Some curries can be made vegan, plus there are vegetable versions of karahi, balti, classic tastes, biriyani, tropical & chilli. Also some of the Thai food dishes. Manager is accommodating to vegan requests.  Be sure to specify.
streetAddress: 1 Eversfield Place, St Leonards on Sea
